0.Pros: -The workers were fun and energetic and loving-free/discounted food at intervals

1.Pros: Flexible with my high school schedule, most managers I had were really nice. They always gave me holidays off. It was a decent first job. Got me experience in cash handling.
1.Cons: What you would expect. The general public is annoying. Got called in a lot. Stayed late a lot. But that's good if you want the extra hours.

2.Pros: Always room to grow if wanted

3.Cons: be able to talk with other managers that understand your point of view

4.Summary: "Clean the store and help cook food."
4.Pros: Great job for helping others and feeding the public, taking the time to listen to the needs of the customer and for filling their needs without personal opinion or view being used.
4.Cons: Employees treating each other like dogs and putting down employees in front of customers while looking for ways to stab them in the back, and get their friends hired in.

5.Pros: Free food, nobody cares what you do
5.Cons: unorganized, dirty, will hire anyone off the street without doing a background check

6.Pros: Excellent hours; decent benefits : work around school
6.Cons: Customers complain about everything! Upset about bar b que sauce when the order doesn't have chicken nuggets!

7.Pros: A lot of the time it's not very busy, so you're just cleaning your station.
7.Cons: The schedule tend to be unpredictable, and sometimes unfair.
